short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides promoted jobs postings on linkedin so you can focus on the jobs you are really interested.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dont waste time on unrelated promoted job postings on linkedin. This extension hides promoted jobs postings on linkedin so you can focus on the jobs you are really interested.

You can also highlight jobs which dont have your search keywords in the job description and save time.

Works on mobile. You can install it on kiwi browser.

Supported languages: English, Turkish, German, French, Spanish

This extension is open source. 
https://github.com/canklot/Linkedin_Promoted_Hider
